marklogic.body: Hello Sherri, I tapered Lexapro in one week, i.e. went from 20 mg for 7 yrs to 10 mg for a week and immediately began my Viibryd 30 day pack.Â Well, I'm on day 4 of the "wonder med" and have had Diarrhea for the first 2 days, then today felt my heart racing, chest hurting, gastro disturbances, and was so dizzy ("whooshing in my head) I could hardly stand.Â I don't know if it's coming the Lexapro or starting the Viibryd.Â All this is to say that tonight I took 10 mg of Lexapro in an attempt to some control of this until I can call my Dr. in the am.Â I did not know Viibryd was touted so highly, (never heard of it until my Dr. gave me the sample pack in attempt to get better results than Lexapro) so I had no grand illusions about it.Â Now I'm afraid of it.Â I thought tapering one week the Lexapro was enough, but perhaps not.Â It seems youÂ are having a rough time getting Off of it.Â Â Now I feel very let down as just going to 10 mg of Lexapro greatly lessened sexual side effects.Â I read one could expect even better results with Viibryd.Â What to do now?Â I would like to keep trying it but I'm only on 10 mg, a lonnnng way before 40 mg.Â I'll talk to my Dr. when his office opens.Â I'm very disappointed in the SE of Viibryd at early outset.Â Gee, I hate to throw in the towel on a drug with promise, but don't know if I can keep going like this, can hardly function.Â Will try to post again with what I decide.Â Thanks for listening. Paula
